ch0287_00_svgirl/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’ve been waiting
for you!
ch0287_00_svgirl/0101_0701_02_10:
Let’s go on a hunt for more shining memories
today!
ch0287_00_svgirl/7101_0701_01_10:
I studied all sorts of subjects at my school in 
Paldea—biology, history, math...
ch0287_00_svgirl/7101_0701_02_10:
The classes were hard, so every now and then I
had a little trouble keeping up, but I made up for
it with some serious studying!
ch0287_00_svgirl/7101_0701_03_10: All the teachers were great, too!
ch0287_00_svgirl/7102_0701_01_10:
Whenever I’m told a place is off-limits, I get
reeeally curious about it. Don’t you?
ch0287_00_svgirl/7102_0701_02_10:
And when I’m told I shouldn’t challenge certain
dangerous Pokémon out there, it makes me wanna
meet them!
ch0287_00_svgirl/7102_0701_03_10: You feel the same way, right? Right?!
ch0287_00_svgirl/7103_0701_01_10:
Making sandwiches while picnicking is really
popular in Paldea!
ch0287_00_svgirl/7103_0701_02_10:
It’s fun being able to customize sandwiches to my
own taste.
ch0287_00_svgirl/7103_0701_03_10:
The sandwiches make Pokémon happy, too, so they
fill my heart just as much as my stomach!
ch0287_00_svgirl/7104_0701_01_10:
Rotom Phones are really convenient—they’re a
must-have travel item for students in Paldea!
ch0287_00_svgirl/7104_0701_02_10:
You can swap out their covers or use the
Roto-Stick to take cool photos—stuff like that!
ch0287_00_svgirl/7104_0701_03_10:
But sometimes that actually kinda slows down
our travels...
ch0287_00_svgirl/7105_0701_01_10:
Do you like studying, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
Do you have a favorite subject or anything?
ch0287_00_svgirl/7105_0701_02_10:
Heh heh... I thought maybe you could teach me
whatever you’re good at, if it’s something I’m not.
ch0287_00_svgirl/7105_0701_03_10:
Oh, and while we’re at it, why don’t we get some
other people together and form a study group?
ch0287_00_svgirl/1701_0701_01_10:
Here’s a present from me to you! I’m sure it’ll be
useful!
ch0287_00_svgirl/1701_0702_01_10:
Thinking about how best to use your items is an
important kind of studying!
ch0287_00_svgirl/2501_0701_01_10: I found so many treasures in Paldea.
ch0287_00_svgirl/2501_0701_02_10:
I met new friends and Pokémon, and the memories
of our adventures together are still burned into my
heart!
ch0287_00_svgirl/2501_0701_03_10: I’m so glad I took part in the Treasure Hunt!
ch0287_00_svgirl/2501_0702_01_10: I hope Pasio also has lots of treasures to find!
ch0287_00_svgirl/2501_0702_02_10:
I don’t know what sort of shine will catch
my eye...
ch0287_00_svgirl/2501_0702_03_10:
but when it happens, I’m sure you’ll be right
there with me!
ch0287_00_svgirl/2511_0701_01_10: Did you know Nemona has a huuuge house?
ch0287_00_svgirl/2511_0701_02_10:
Her family’s even got in-house staff. I was really
surprised the first time I went there!
ch0287_00_svgirl/2511_0702_01_10:
Now that I think about it, my very first Pokémon
battle was on the beach by Nemona’s house.
ch0287_00_svgirl/2511_0702_02_10:
I feel like almost all of my memories with Nemona
revolve around Pokémon battles...
ch0287_00_svgirl/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! Any plans for today? Maybe some
studying, battling, or cooking?
ch0287_00_svgirl/3003_0701_01_10:
If you’re tired from battling and studying too much,
clear your mind with a picnic!
ch0287_00_svgirl/3005_0701_01_10:
The shooting stars in the night sky remind me of
my shining adventures in Paldea!
